name: simulate_thyroid_hormone_pharmacokinetics
description: Simulates the transport and binding of thyroid hormones across different tissue compartments using an ODE-based pharmacokinetic model.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.description: Dictionary containing model parameters: transport_rates, binding_constants, metabolism_rates, and volumes

inputs.name: initial_conditions
inputs.description: Dictionary of initial concentrations for all molecular species in each compartment

inputs.name: time_span
inputs.description: Start and end time for simulation in hours

inputs.name: time_points
inputs.description: Number of time points to output

output.description: Research log summarizing the simulation and results
